Text: thank you man !! really appreciate this..
Am I the only one to get an error in the installation ?
I actually bought the series. I wanted to support Telltale. But I download this release for my mother :)    Thanks!
Downloaded fine, moved the crack into the correct place but everytime i click on the application it says it has stopped working and i cannot load it up! Helppp guys.

for people that are having trouble getting the crack to work. All you have to do is install the game then open the folder with the installed game in it. the copy the crack to that folder. it will ask if you want to replace the files, click yes and the game is unlocked. thanks for the download.
